dimension:

10 7/16 x 10 9/16 in. (26.5 x 26.8 cm) (sheet)
title: Design for a Token: Marine, 1744
marks:
Inscriptions, Title, Date, Mark

Red chalk, alon
description: Medallion design with birth of Venus; verso, on white paper, laid down on the blue mount in graphite: an architectural view with standing male figure with left hand, an overdoor gallery with a monkey holding a parrot
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
